author: Reuters Editorial
title: Turkey calls on international organizations to investigate Syria attack
text:
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - Turkey said on Monday international organizations must investigate what happened in Syria’s Douma, after an alleged chemical attack killed dozens.
A child is treated in a hospital in Douma, eastern Ghouta in Syria, after what a Syria medical relief group claims was a suspected chemical attack April, 7, 2018. White Helmets/Handout via REUTERS “International organizations, especially the Organisation for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons, need to investigate and inform the world with the correct information about what happened over there,” government spokesman Bekir Bozdag said. He added that information received suggested clearly that chemical weapons were used.
Reporting by Ezgi Erkoyun; editing by Andrew Roche
